item.title: Potato Soup
item.description: Times Total: 70 mins Servings: 8 Ingredients 1 1/2 pounds baking potatoes 1/4 pound butter 2 cups diced yellow onion 1/3 cup all purpose flour 5 cups water 1/4 cup low sodium chicken base 1 cup instant potato flakes (flavored ones if you like) 3/4 teaspoon dried basil 1/2 teaspoon Tabasco sauce 1 cup heavy cream 1 cup milk salt to taste white pepper to taste Ham, if you’re into that Steps Preheat oven to 400.
